segments.text: Those kids are up to no good, climbing on that stool to get cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far; that stool looks like it's about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl is just standing there, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being so sneaky, thinking their mom won't notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But she's too busy with the dishes to see what they're doing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how bold they're being, right behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really reaching high, balancing on his tiptoes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall; that would be a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems to be encouraging him, like it's some kind of game.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're both so focused on those cookies, nothing else matters to them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've done this before and gotten away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR
